name: Tanks 'N Towers
description:
Tanks 'N Towers is a classic Tower Defence game with a twist!

Jump between Build Mode and Tank Mode to fight the invading alien force.

A good offence is a great defence. In Build Mode you can strengthen your defence by placing down a variety of towers.

A good defence is a great offence? In Tank Mode you take matters into your own hands by fighting the aliens on the frontlines.

Use materials dropped by slayed aliens to upgrade both your Towers and your Tank and gain new abilities. 

Credits

Tanks 'N Towers is a  game made by a group of students at Stockholm University. 

  • Sverker Berggren: Game Designer
  • Ella Ek: Game Designer
  • Markus Koffman: Programmer
  • August Lundquist: Programmer
  • Marcus Hedenberg: Programmer
  • Noah Vikström: 2D Artist / UI Designer
  • Leo Lindblom: 3D Artist
  • Johan Salqvist: 3D Artist
